page.title: 06New Buildings in Torphichen.
page.content: Recently plans have been passed by West Lothian District Council to build twelve terraced houses in the open space next to Torphichen School. This is a very unpopular development with people living in the area. Most people living nearby think that the green will be far too cramped and the view will be spoiled. The majority of people would rather see three to four bungalows or cottages instead of twelve terraced houses. Another criticism is that parking may cause problems as spaces will be very restricted and cause congestion. Mothers are worried for the safety of their children as there would be no playing area for them next to their homes.There have been several formal complaints from the householders to West Lothian District Council but to no avail.
